channel.title: Not on the Loop Guide
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Not on the Loop Guide"

item.title: Re: Not on the Loop Guide
item.content:encoded: Your stamina gets reset after you loop. So if you spend all your stamina in S1, then loop, you'll have full Genin stamina. Your max stamina also gets reset to genin levels.

item.title: Not on the Loop Guide
item.content:encoded: if I loop with 30 stamina will I have 30 stamina after Im done with the loop and if I have 380 when I loop will I have 380 stamina as a gennin?
